definitions.definition: Any of the Old World plants, of the genus Calendula , with orange, yellow or reddish flowers.
Any of the New World plants, of the genus Tagetes , with orange, yellow or reddish flowers.
Alternative form of Marigold ( rubber glove for cleaning )

main_definition: Any of the Old World plants, of the genus Calendula , with orange, yellow or reddish flowers.
secondary_definitions: Any of the New World plants, of the genus Tagetes , with orange, yellow or reddish flowers.
( UK , slang , obsolete ) A million pounds sterling .
Alternative form of Marigold ( rubber glove for cleaning )
